Class Dicho

java.lang.Object
  Dicho

public class Dicho
extends java.lang.Object

Defines a javascool panel which allows to experiment the dichotomic search. Usage: 

 import static Dicho.compare;
 import static Dicho.length;

Method Detail

compare

public static int compare(java.lang.String name,
                          int page)
Compares a name to the page's name.

Parameters:
name - The name to compare with.
page - The page index from 0 to length().
Returns:
-1 if the name is before the given page, +1 if the name is after the given page, 0 if it is the right page.

getIndex

public static int getIndex(java.lang.String name)
Gets the index of a given page.
- DO NOT USE !!! This is the solution of the excercice !!!

Parameters:
name - The name to compare with.
Returns:
The page index or -1 if the name is not on some page.

Returns the panel.

public static int length()
Returns the number of pages.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] arguments)
Used to test this panel.
Simply use: javac Dicho.java ; java Dicho to test.
